Personally, I think it would be nice if people  in the business of making 
=
"spirit boxes" would give credit to Frank  Sumption more often, after all i=
f 
not for him, we may not even have been  given the idea to create them in=
 the 
first place.   Thank you  Frank,  sf
 
 
In a message dated 11/9/2011=
 2:02:46 P.M. Eastern Standard Time,  
lauraobryant@... writes:

 
 
=
 
 


I got initiated into the paranormal 4 yrs ago and accidentally got my=
  
first EVP 3 yrs ago. I went crazy searching for information about spirit=
  boxes. 
And what I found is that most people sing the praises of Frank's =
Ghost  box 
and Frank Sumption. I didn't know who Frank Sumption was (still=
 don't know  
you personally) but from what I could tell there were (are) m=
any many 
people  who believe that Frank Sumption is a giant when it comes =
to spirit  
boxes. 


You can't control what people say or do. But your wor=
k seems to stand on  
it's own merit. So it doesn't matter what your compet=
itors say, it still  
stands that Frank Sumption is the giant among spirit =
boxes and is up there  
with Thomas Edison. You are letting them upset you =
when the reality is, you  
are still on top. So let them say what they want=
. And let them make  
improvements and have their own merit. From my point =
of view, as an outsider  looking 
in, they are standing on your shoulders. =
I have no vestment in this  
argument or in you and your rivals. Don't let =
them drive you insane with their  
claims or weigh you down with unnecessar=
y anger and bitterness. You are doing  
just fine. 


Question now is, are =
you going to believe those who anger you and tell  you 
you are not the ori=
ginal creator OR are you going to believe someone that  
is a total strange=
r that did her research a few years ago before stumbling  
onto this argume=
nt? And may I remind you I have no vestment in this argument 
 whatsoever? =
You could say I'm biased since when I researched I came to 
believe  myself=
 that Frank Sumption was/is a giant when it comes to spirit 
boxes. If I  w=
ere you, I'd choose to believe me and go on to create bad ass 
equipment an=
d  not reveal your secrets. :)
Laura
 
  
_________________________________=
___
 From: purplespacefriend  <purplealiengirl@...>
To: EVP-ITC@yahoo=
groups.com
Sent: Wednesday, November 9, 2011 1:37  PM
Subject: [EVP-ITC] Re=
:  Mirror, mirror on the wall.......


 
 
Academic! I am not going to spen=
d the last few months of this Earth cycle  
arguing with jerk fucks that wa=
nna rip off all things paranormal cuz they 
can  not make a name for themse=
lves in any other field. "The paranormal" 
requires  no proof, no credentia=
ls, all one has to do is make some grandiose 
claims and  followers fall ou=
t of the trees. 

"My guys" repeat over and over and  over, everytime I tur=
n on a box the 
last couple months "June  15th--wormwood--end of Earth"(par=
aphrasing), yeah, I 
know, everyone some how  knows better, just like they =
know nothing to the 
Mayan, and all the other end  of days predictions from=
 around the world-- 
every freaking culture, and all  time periods up the p=
resent, for the same 
frikkin' date/year.

Hmmm,  Wormwood!? A bitter herb/=
drug--a cure for Eartha? Ahhhh, no 
comet/asteroid  named Wormwood, it's an=
 effect of an asteroid/comet/natural 
disaster. A drug,  a cure, a cleansin=
g. 

F-S

--- In _EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com_ (mailto:EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com)=
 , Laura  
OBryant <lauraobryant@...> wrote:
>
> 
> 
> I  have been reading=
 the arguments for a few weeks now and can I say what 
I  think? Just as Ne=
wton and Einstein and others like them are giants, they 
have  people such =
as Stephen Hawking that stand on their shoulders. The 
Hawkings  that stand=
 on the shoulders of giants are no less genius in their own 
right  and sho=
uld also be given credit also. But we can't forget that the 
giants  themse=
lves made mistakes and had failures along the way. They are no 
less than  =
genius for their trial and errors as well as their successes. For 
had we n=
ot  had the giants, failures and all, we would not advance any 
further in =
 technology and wisdom. :)
> 
> Another thought is many times ideas  come a=
round the same time in 
different locations. This is a phenomenon that  has=
 fascinated me and I often 
wonder how 2 or more people can get the same  t=
hought in roughly the same time 
period. Take for instance the discovery of=
  small particles in atoms (or 
molecules, I am rusty at my science sorry).=
 There  were scientists discovering 
these in different locations around th=
e world at  the same time! I'm sure it 
can be argued that one scientist di=
scovered the  break through before another 
but it doesn't dispute the fact=
 that both were  working on the same thing 
in the same time period.=C3=82 =

> 
> So  for argument sake let's give credit to those who have successfull=
y 
engineered  the spirit boxes and those who have stood on the shoulders o=
f the 
original  inventors and keep in mind there may be a few of the origi=
nal 
inventors at the  same time! You discovered it. GREAT! How wonderful t=
hat you 
contributed to  something so genius! I hope that you continue to e=
xperiment 
and enrich us with  your findings and failings as those are impo=
rtant too. 
(Remember that Edison  failed many times with the light bulb be=
fore he got it 
right.) I would  encourage all of you to go forward and adv=
ance your 
technologies and remember  there is always someone trying to ste=
al fame and fortune. 
You can protect your  ideas with patents before relea=
sing them to the 
public if you are really  concerned with ownership of ori=
ginality.=C3=82 
> 
> I hope I  haven't overstepped my bounds but I want to=
 reassure those who 
are frustrated  that there are those who recognize gen=
ius and those who 
stand on shoulders  from those who steal. Just because w=
e are silent doesn't 
mean we are blind,  deaf, and mute. I hope this helps=
.=C3=82 
> 
> Laura
>

uck up and look in  the mirror. Since day

other is the master box  user and determines who 
can use the box,=C3=82 an=

the loonies, the con men, the  tricksters, the posers, and the 
"ones that =
know better". Not getting sucked  into the dark with this box crap 
any lon=
ger,=C3=82 it was supposed to be for  my own use anyway, y'all simply 
can'=
t handle that level of spirit  communication. Learned the hard way that 
th=
ere is a reason why certain  knowledge is withheld from the uninitiated. =
=C3=82 I 
can't fix what I have  done, all I can do is walk away. Like the =
guy said 
"you can't handle=C3=82 the  truth!" 
> >=C3=82 
> >=C3=82 Not go=
nna debate it, been  there done that, no one hears or listens, 
always " Oh=
, I know so much better"  is the response. "For my research", 
yeah, heard =
that about five hundred times!  
> >=C3=82 
> >=C3=82 Time for me to seek t=
he light side of  the force--while there is still 
time. 
> >=C3=82
